article_title: Which fitness band is best for you?
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

EDWARDSVILLE, IL (KTVI) - Did you get a fitness bands as a holiday gift, or are you thinking of buying one? Which one does a better job at tracking your activity? Researchers at SIU-Edwardsville asked the same question and compared some of the most popular fitness bands.

Bryan Smith, a professor of kinesiology and health education at SIUE, visits Fox 2 News in the Morning with the results of this study.
